com.elvenrings.qdemo.interfaces

Interface Marker

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FillBlankMarker, MultipleChoiceMarker, SingleChoiceMarker

    public interface Marker
    Implementation classes of this interface determine if a question has been answered correctly or otherwise after receiving an event after certain input actions have been performed.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Iliasu Salifu, iliasu@elvenrings.com

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isCorrect(Event event)
      Returns a boolean indicating if a question has been answered correctly or wrongly in response to an input event.

    • Method Detail

      • isCorrect

        boolean isCorrect(Event event)
        Returns a boolean indicating if a question has been answered correctly or wrongly in response to an input event.
        Parameters:
        event - with information about question answered
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if a question has been answered correctly or wrongly
